title: Navigating Maternity in the Workplace UK | A Practical Guide | Torchbox

metadata.description: Read our guide by Gemma, Senior People Manager. Personal insights and practical resources to support working mums. Foster a compassionate, inclusive workplace culture. Download the information sheet.
